## ğŸ“¥ Installation

### Docker
```bash
docker pull ghcr.io/sheshiyer/selemene-engine:vX.Y.Z
```

### From Source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Sheshiyer/Selemene-engine.git
cd Selemene-engine
git checkout vX.Y.Z
cargo build --release
```
